CookieChangeEventDeleted.summary: The deleted read-only property of the interface returns an array of the cookies that have been deleted by the given CookieChangeEvent instance.

remarks.para: Note that this will include cookies which were created with an expiry date in the past, as these cookies are immediately deleted.

CookieChangeEventDeleted.value: An array of objects containing the deleted cookie(s). Each object contains the following properties:
